item.description:
February 20th is Love Your Pet Day! How PERFECT is that?

I was looking up crazy holidays for February. When I found this little gem I couldn't wait to pick Love Your Pet as the theme for our next meet up. I also found out the 3rd week of this month is International Flirting Week?! Special treat for anyone who can figure out where their breed originated from. Maybe when we see our pooches flirting with each other we'll discover we have an international romance on our hands? Hee hee. Silly prize for the longest - distance relationship!

So if you aren't able to come to our Valentine's Day Party on February 13th you can still LOVE your PET here with us from 11am-1pm.

Please remember to update vaccines for Rabies, DHLLP, & Bordatella.

Love and puppy kisses xoxo

Auntie Becky
item.name: Love Your Pet Day!
